title: Dagger and Rose
description: A hauntingly beautiful photograph of a woman holding a dagger with a red rose.

title: Handcrafted Gothic Skull
description: A beautifully crafted anatomical skull sculpture that captures the essence of gothic melancholy. The perfect accent for any dark and moody interior.

title: Serpent’s Door Handle
description: An ornate black-and-white photograph of a serpent-shaped door knocker framed with baroque flourishes.

title: Gothic Victorian Necklace and Choker Set with Bracelet
description: An elegant handcrafted Victorian gothic jewelry set adorned with intricate detailing- the perfect accent for a darkly romantic wardrobe.
materials: Black fabric, bronze and silver metals

title: Haunted Rose Musk Candle
description: A hauntingly beautiful rose musk candle with notes of pomegranate and beeswax. Its soft glow and gothic aroma fill the air with the timeless essence of a moonlit stroll.
details: Rose-scented musk with notes of pomegranate

title: Photograph of Glass Conservatory
description: A captivating photograph capturing the ethereal beauty of a gothic-inspired glass conservatory.
materials: Printed on archival paper, framed in wood

title: Velvet Gothic-Inspired Armchair
description: An opulent Victorian-inspired armchair upholstered in deep burgundy velvet. Hand-carved mahogany details and brass accents elevate its timeless gothic elegance.
materials: Mahogany wood, velvet fabric, brass accents

title: Crystal Reverie Chandelier
description: A stunning black-and-white photograph of a crystal chandelier, its hundreds of hand-cut prisms catching and refracting light into ethereal shadows within a gothic cathedral setting.
materials: Printed on archival paper, black metal frame

title: Portrait of a Lady with Flowers
description: A hauntingly beautiful portrait that captures the essence of romantic melancholy. This photograph, reminiscent of the Renaissance era, depicts a woman draped in flowers, evoking the warmth and intimacy of an oil painting.
